## useLazyMint() function

Lazy mint NFTs on an NFT Drop program

## Example

```jsx
import { useProgram, useLazyMintNFT } from "@web3sdks/react/solana";

export default function Component() {
  const { program } = useProgram("{{program_address}}");
  const { mutateAsync: lazyMint, isLoading, error } = useLazyMintNFT(program);

  return (
    <button onClick={() => lazyMint({ name: "My NFT", description: "..." })}>
      Claim
    </button>
  );
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useLazyMint(
  program: RequiredParam<NFTDrop>,
  onProgress?: (progress: UploadProgressEvent) => void,
): import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult<
  import("@web3sdks/sdk/solana").TransactionResult[],
  unknown,
  {
    metadatas: NFTMetadataInput[];
  },
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                                       | Description                                   |
| ---------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------- |
| program    | RequiredParam&lt;NFTDrop&gt;               | The NFT Drop program instance to lazy mint on |
| onProgress | (progress: UploadProgressEvent) =&gt; void | <i>(Optional)</i>                             |

**Returns:**

import("@tanstack/react-query").UseMutationResult&lt;import("@web3sdks/sdk/solana").TransactionResult\[\], unknown, { metadatas: NFTMetadataInput\[\]; }, unknown&gt;
